metadata.feature_description: Report inappropriate wiki articles or comments to moderators

steps.action: Navigate to Wiki Test page to access wiki articles
steps.expected: Wiki module with list of articles should be displayed
steps.actual: Wiki module displayed with 6 existing articles in list view

steps.action: Click on an article to access article detail view where Report button is located
steps.expected: Article detail view should load showing Report link
steps.actual: Article detail page returned 404 error - page not found. The Report button only exists in article detail view (Article.ascx line 109) which is inaccessible

issues: Wiki article detail pages return 404 errors - URLs like /en-us/Wiki-Test/[Article-Name] are not found
Report button is only visible in article detail view which cannot be accessed
Feature cannot be tested due to environment routing/configuration issue

steps.action: Navigate to article detail view to access comments section
steps.expected: Article detail view with comments section and report functionality
steps.actual: Cannot access article detail view - all article URLs return 404 errors. Comments are only displayed in article detail view which is inaccessible

issues: Comments section is only visible in article detail view (Article.ascx)
Article detail pages return 404 errors preventing access to comments
SubmitCommentReport API endpoint exists in ReportController.cs but cannot be tested via UI

steps.action: Attempt to access Report dialog to verify reason selection functionality
steps.expected: Report dialog should open with reason selection dropdown
steps.actual: Cannot access Report dialog - requires article detail view which returns 404 error

issues: Report dialog (social:Report control) is rendered in Article.ascx but not accessible
Code shows ReportSubmission model accepts reason parameter but cannot be tested

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Create new article to access report functionality

steps.action: Click Create Article button to create a new article as workaround
Fill in article title and content fields
steps.expected: Form should accept input and allow publishing
steps.actual: Form shows validation errors 'Text is required' even though fields appear filled. Article creation fails.

issues: Article creation form validation fails despite fields being populated
This prevented the workaround approach to access article detail view and test Report functionality

observations: Code review confirms Content Reporting feature exists: ReportController.cs contains SubmitReport and SubmitCommentReport API endpoints
Article.ascx line 109 contains Report link: <a href="javascript:void(0)" data-bind="click: report">
Notifications.cs contains ReportArticle method that sends notifications to moderators when articles are reported
dnn.social.DetailView.js contains report() function that calls dnn.social.reportContent()
Scoring actions are logged for FlaggedArticle and FlaggedComment when reports are submitted
Feature appears fully implemented in code but cannot be tested due to wiki article detail pages returning 404 errors
This is an environment/routing configuration issue, not a code defect in the Content Reporting feature itself
